predicate.note: Frames file for 'concoct' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 26.4, Framenet entries Invention and Cooking creation.

roleset.name: create something complicated

example.name: active
example.text: Goya Concocts a Milk For Hispanic Tastes

example.name: passive
example.text: Embedded in the ``budget'' being concocted *trace* by the House-Senate conference committee is something that looks, smells and waddles like a duck.

roleset.note: Higher numbered args suggested by inclusion in 'create' class, but I doubt they'd ever occur.
